title: Calories in Steak Burrito Chipotle
meta_description: Discover calories in steak burrito Chipotle, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, carbs, fat, and easy tweaks for your order.
assumptions: Standard Chipotle steak burrito: flour tortilla, adobo-marinated steak, cilantro-lime white rice, black beans, fajita veggies, fresh tomato salsa, Monterey Jack cheese, and sour cream; no guacamole or extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact ingredients, portion sizes, customizations, and preparation at Chipotle locations. Check the Chipotle app or website for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Chipotle steak burrito contains about 825 calories and 38g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Chipotle steak burrito?
faqs.a: Approximately 825 calories for a standard build with rice, beans, veggies, salsa, cheese, and sour cream.

faqs.q: What's the protein in steak burrito Chipotle?
faqs.a: About 38g of protein, mainly from the steak and beans.

faqs.q: Are Chipotle steak burritos high in sodium?

faqs.q: How do carbs break down in a steak burrito from Chipotle?
faqs.a: Roughly 102g total carbs, with 9g fiber from beans and veggies, and low sugars at 4g.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie Chipotle steak burrito?
faqs.a: Opt for no cheese or sour cream, add more veggies, or choose a bowl instead of tortilla to cut 200+ calories.
